content.question: The use of alliteration in line 11 (“The ceaseless . . . tide”) mainly serves to

choices.label: convey the ocean’s indifference to human weariness
evoke the untamed chaos of the natural world
echo the repetitive rhythms of the waves’ motions
emphasize the speaker’s composure in the face of difficulties

content.answer: echo the repetitive rhythms of the waves’ motions

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain the function of specific words and phrases in a text.
